item.title: Java Annotations - Introduction
item.description: Java custom annotations are generally used with interceptors or AOP . Using the custom annotations to design your own framework can make the code look very elegant. What is Annotations ? Java annotation is an annotation mechanism, introduced by jdk5.0. Classes, methods, variables, parameters and packages in the Java language can be labeled. Unlike the Javadoc, Annotation can obtain annotation content through reflection. When the compiler generates class files, annotations can be embedded in bytecode.

item.title: My 10st post
item.description: The following HTML <h1>—<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is the highest section level while <h6> is the lowest. H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Paragraph Xerum, quo qui aut unt expliquam qui dolut labo.
